FILE: cm616666v11.0.txt
DYAD: TUNISIA - ISRAEL
RIVALRY: RIV1176
DISPUTE(S): MID2563 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190429
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190429

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2563

TERRMID: MID2563 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2563 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2563 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2563 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2563 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2563 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2563 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2563 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2563 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2563 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID2563 coded not civil war because although the terrorist group involved in this MID, the PLO, is active in Israel/Palestine and is organized to oppose Israel, the conflict activity in this MID does not occur in Israel. 

CIVWARLINK: MID2563 1 -- civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2563 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID2563 from Gibler 2018, in 1985 Israel attacked Palestinian Liberation Headquarters in Tunisia in retaliation for the PLO attacking Israeli civilians in Cyprus. Coded civil war link because this was connected to terrorist attacks in Cyprus, outside this dyad. 

COUPMID: MID2563 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2563 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2563 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2563 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:
Israeli military aircraft attacked *Palestinian Liberation Organization *(PLO) headquarters in near Tunis, Tunisia on October 1, 1985, resulting in the deaths of some 50 individuals. Tunisia referred the matter to the *United Nations *(UN) Security Council on October 1, 1985. Algeria, Egypt, and Morocco condemned Israel on October 2, 1985. The UN Security Council condemned Israel on October 5, 1985. On September 7, 1986, the *Non-Aligned Movement* (NAM) foreign ministers condemned the Israeli attack against Tunisia.

SOURCES-CM: 
*Africa Contemporary Record *(ACR), 1986-1987; *Africa Research Bulletin *(ARB), November 15, 1985; Tillema, 1991, 141-142; Weisburd, 1997, 166.

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
